snippet: A district court found that Norbert Moosmann, of the Black Forest town of Rickenbach, had staged the throwing of an empty Molotov cocktail into his office.
abstract: Norbert Moosmann, mayor of German town of Rickenbach, is convicted of staging attack against himself; Moosmann's motives remain unclear.
lead_paragraph: A district court found that Norbert Moosmann, of the Black Forest town of Rickenbach, had staged the throwing of an empty Molotov cocktail into his office.

headline.seo: German Mayor Convicted of Faking Attack on Himself
headline.main: In a German Town, Court Finds That Mayor Cried Wolf
headline.print_headline: Court Finds That a Mayor Cried Wolf
